IntVectorProperty.name: IndexedLookup
IntVectorProperty.label: Interpret Values As Categories
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the color transfer function switches to indexed-lookup (categorical colors) mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableOpacityMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the opacity transfer function is used for rendering, if applicable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RGBPoints
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the control points that form the color-transfer-function. These are a list of 4-tuples of the form (x, r, g, b) where x is the data value, and r,g,b are three color components in the range [0,1].

IntVectorProperty.name: LockScalarRange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true (1), the application will not try to automatically change scalar range whenever the application may usually update the lookup table scalar ranges.

IntVectorProperty.name: ColorSpace
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The color space used for interpolation: RGB, HSV, Lab (CIELAB), or Diverging. In HSV mode, if HSVWrap is on, it will take the shortest path in Hue (going back through 0 if that is the shortest way around the hue circle) whereas if HSVWrap is off it will not go through 0 (in order the match the current functionality of vtkLookupTable). Diverging is a special mode where colors will pass through white when interpolating between two saturated colors.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseBelowRangeColor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use special color to use when a data value is below the range of the color map.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BelowRangeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color to use when a data value is below the range of the color map.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAboveRangeColor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use special color to use when a data value is above the range of the color map.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: AboveRangeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color to use when a data value is above the range of the color map.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NanColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color to use when NaN (not-a-number) is encountered.

IntVectorProperty.name: Discretize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the color transfer function will comprise of discrete colors with number of discrete colors specified using NumberOfTableValues.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfTableValues
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When Discretize is set, this specifies the number of discrete colors that must be present in the transfer function.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScalarRangeInitialized
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to 1 to indicate that the scalar range has been initialized.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: IndexedColors
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Colors used when using IndexedLookup is true.

Proxy.name: PointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Point locator based on a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets for point location and generic (zero or non-zero) tolerance point insertion.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an absolute tolerance for check-based / tolerance-based point insertion.

Proxy.label: Uniform Binning
Proxy.name: MergePoints
Proxy.Documentation: A point merger using a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets for zero tolerance point insertion (to avoid exactly duplicate / coincident points).

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

Proxy.label: Don't Merge Points
Proxy.name: NonMergingPointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Perform direct / check-free point insertion (any point is inserted to a vtkPoints object) and therefore there can be duplicate points.

IntVectorProperty.name: Divisions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of divisions in each axis / direction (x, y, z) for creating a search structure of uniform fixed-resolution bins / buckets.

IntVectorProperty.label: Number of points per bucket
IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPointsPerBucket
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the average number of points in each bin / bucket that determines the initial and growing sizes (in terms of number of points) of each bin / bucket.

Proxy.name: IncrementalOctreePointLocator
Proxy.Documentation: Point locator based on a fast search structure of data-aware multi-resolution octree nodes for point location and generic (zero or non-zero) tolerance point insertion.

IntVectorProperty.label: Max number of points per leaf
IntVectorProperty.name: MaxPointsPerLeaf
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the maximum number of points that a leaf node may maintain. This value is a trade-off between the cost of dynamic octree construction (top-down recursive node sub-division into eight children as points are incrementally inserted to the octree) and the speed of point location (particularly within a container leaf node).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an absolute tolerance for check-based / tolerance-based point insertion.

Proxy.label: Octree Binning
Proxy.name: IncrementalOctreeMergePoints
Proxy.Documentation: A point merger exploiting a fast search structure of data-aware multi-resolution octree nodes for zero-tolerance point insertion (to avoid exactly duplicate / coincident points).

IntVectorProperty.label: Max number of points per leaf
IntVectorProperty.name: MaxPointsPerLeaf
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the maximum number of points that a leaf node may maintain. This value is a trade-off between the cost of dynamic octree construction (top-down recursive node sub-division into eight children as points are incrementally inserted to the octree) and the speed of point location (particularly within a container leaf node).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Always specify a zero tolerance for point insertion --- merging points.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarRangeInitialized
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to 1 to indicate that the scalar range has been initialized.

IntVectorProperty.name: TitleJustification
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the justification of the title text with respect to the scalar color bar.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutomaticAnnotations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, annotations are automatically created according the number of colors shown on the scalar bar.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawTickMarks
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable drawing the color legend tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawSubTickMarks
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable drawing the color legend sub-tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawTickLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable drawing the color legend labels for tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: TextPosition
IntVectorProperty.label: Tick and Annotation Positions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines where the tick labels are drawn.

StringVectorProperty.name: ActiveFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the filename whose information we need.

StringVectorProperty.name: WorkingDirectory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Override the working directory used to resolve relative paths.

TimeKeeperProxy.name: TimeKeeper
TimeKeeperProxy.Documentation: TimeKeeper is used to keep the pipeline time for the application. All views added to the timekeeper show the same time as that on the time keeper.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The timesteps currently available. This property does not have any information helper since vtkSMTimeKeeperProxy keeps this updated without any need to call UpdatePropertyInformation().

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the time range. It's possible that there are no TimestepValues but there is a valid TimeRange since some sources may provide continuous time.

StringVectorProperty.name: TimeLabel
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the string that is used as label to eventually replace "time" by something else such as "frequency" or any user specific label that the user want to set to use a 4th dimension that is not time.

ProxyProperty.name: Views
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Views with their view time linked with this time keeper.

ProxyProperty.name: TimeSources
ProxyProperty.Documentation: List of proxies that provide time. TimestepValues property has a set of timesteps provided by all the sources added to this property alone.

ProxyProperty.name: SuppressedTimeSources
ProxyProperty.Documentation: List of proxies that are to supressed i.e their times to be ignored.

PluginLoaderProxy.name: PluginLoader
PluginLoaderProxy.Documentation: Use this proxy to load a plugin remotely. This proxy has no properties that users can set. Only information-properties are provided that can be used to obtain various states. vtkSMPluginLoaderProxy has API that can be used to load plugins, configuration xmls etc.

ProxyProperty.name: KdTree
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the KdTree managed by this manager.

ProxyProperty.name: Producers
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Producers/algorithms producing data that needs to be distributed.

ProxyProperty.name: StructuredProducer
ProxyProperty.Documentation: The optional producer whose partitioning is used to build the KdTree.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Surface
DoubleVectorProperty.name: SurfaceColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used when solid coloring surfaces and faces.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Foreground
DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForegroundColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for rendering elements like wireframes, points.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Edges
DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for the edges when using 'Surface With Wireframe' representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Background
DoubleVectorProperty.name: BackgroundColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used as background for the view.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Text
DoubleVectorProperty.name: TextAnnotationColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for text and other annotations.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Selection
DoubleVectorProperty.name: SelectionColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for showing selected cells/points.

Property.name: LoadPalette
Property.Documentation: You can explicitly set the colors in the application's color palette above or you can load one of the predefined color palettes to initialize the active palette.

Proxy.name: GlobalMapperProperties
Proxy.Documentation: This proxy is useful for changing global mapper settings such as the coincident topology resolution setting on all rendering proceses.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolygonOffsetParameters
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Used to set the polygon offset scale factor and units. Used when ResolveCoincidentTopology is set to PolygonOffset. These are global variables.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolygonOffsetFaces
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Used when ResolveCoincidentTopology is set to PolygonOffset. The polygon offset can be applied either to the solid polygonal faces or the lines/vertices. When set (default), the offset is applied to the faces otherwise it is applied to lines and vertices. This is a global variable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ZShift
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Used to set the z-shift if ResolveCoincidentTopology is set to ShiftZBuffer. This is a global variable.

IntVectorProperty.name: GlobalImmediateModeRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off flag to control whether data is rendered using immediate mode or note. Immediate mode rendering tends to be slower but it can handle larger datasets. The default value is immediate mode off. If you are having problems rendering a large dataset you might want to consider using immediate more rendering.

Proxy.name: TimerLog
Proxy.Documentation: This is a proxy used to control the timer log parameters on all processes. Note that since vtkTimerLog has loads of static ivar, most properties will affect all timer log instances.

Property.name: ResetLog
Property.Documentation: Resets the log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enable
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enables the timer-log on all processes.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxEntries
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum length for the log on all processes.

ViewLayoutProxy.name: ViewLayout
ViewLayoutProxy.Documentation: Proxy used to manage layout for mutliple views.

Proxy.name: InternalViewLayoutHelper
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy used to manage layout for mutliple views.

Proxy.name: PickingHelper
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy used to pick a point of a surface mesh.

ProxyProperty.name: Input
ProxyProperty.Documentation: The input from which the selection is extracted.

ProxyProperty.name: Selection
ProxyProperty.Documentation: The selection that is used to reduced the input.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: X3DExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkX3DExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into an X3D file. X3D is an XML-based format for representation 3D scenes (similar to VRML). Check out http://www.web3d.org/x3d/ for more details.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: Binary
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on binary mode

IntVectorProperty.name: Fastest
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In binary mode use fastest instead of best compression.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: VRMLExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an VRML file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

CSVExporterProxy.name: CSVExporter
CSVExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an CSV file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

RenderViewExporterProxy.name: POVExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPOVExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into an POV Ray file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSExporterBase
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all GL2PS vector graphic exporters.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSRenderViewExporterBase
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all GL2PS render view exporters.

IntVectorProperty.name: SetSort
IntVectorProperty.label: GL2PS depth sort method
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Method of sorting 3D primitives.

IntVectorProperty.name: Write3DPropsAsRasterImage
IntVectorProperty.label: Rasterize 3D geometry
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Export all 3D geometry as a rasterized image behind 2D geometry, which is still rendered as vector graphics.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExcludeCubeAxesActorsFromRasterization
IntVectorProperty.label: Don't rasterize cube axes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If rasterizing 3D geometry, setting this option will export all cube axes actors as vector graphics.

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSContextViewExporterBase
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all GL2PS context view exporters.

IntVectorProperty.name: SetSort
IntVectorProperty.label: GL2PS depth sort method
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Method of sorting 3D primitives.

IntVectorProperty.name: Write3DPropsAsRasterImage
IntVectorProperty.label: Rasterize 3D geometry
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Export all 3D geometry as a rasterized image behind 2D geometry, which is still rendered as vector graphics.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExcludeCubeAxesActorsFromRasterization
IntVectorProperty.label: Don't rasterize cube axes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If rasterizing 3D geometry, setting this option will export all cube axes actors as vector graphics.

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSRenderViewExporterPS
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSRenderViewExporterEPS
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSRenderViewExporterPDF
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSRenderViewExporterSVG
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSContextViewExporterPS
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSContextViewExporterEPS
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSContextViewExporterPDF
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

GL2PSExporterProxy.name: GL2PSContextViewExporterSVG
GL2PSExporterProxy.Documentation: vtkPVGL2PSExporter is a render window exporter which writes out the renderered scene into a variety of vector graphics formats.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the output file format: 0: PostScript, 1: Encapsulated PostScript, 2: PDF, 3: TeX, 4: SVG

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to write into

Proxy.name: PointPlacerBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all point placers.

Proxy.name: ContourLineInterpolatorBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all contour line interpolators.

Proxy.name: TileDisplayHelper
Proxy.Documentation: Helper proxy used to enable/disable server side tile image dump.

StringVectorProperty.name: DumpImagePath
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Full Path + prefix file name. The image full path will be: ${DumpImagePath}-Tile${processId}.png

LiveInsituLinkProxy.name: LiveInsituLink
LiveInsituLinkProxy.Documentation: Proxy used to connect to Catalyst CoProcessor for live-data visualization.

IntVectorProperty.name: SimulationPaused
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Pauses or continues the simulation.

Proxy.name: PythonTraceOptions
Proxy.Documentation: Options proxy used to prompt user for tracing options when starting trace.

IntVectorProperty.name: PropertiesToTraceOnCreate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which properties to save in trace

IntVectorProperty.name: FullyTraceSupplementalProxies
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Fully trace supplemental objects, such as color maps, color bars, etc. when accessed the first time in trace.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowIncrementalTrace
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show trace as it is being generated.

Proxy.name: PythonStateOptions
Proxy.Documentation: Options proxy used to prompt user for python state options.

IntVectorProperty.name: PropertiesToTraceOnCreate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which properties to save in state

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipHiddenDisplayProperties
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Skip displays properties/representations for elements hidden in a view.
